title: Refund Policy
intro: This Refund Policy explains when refunds may be available for purchases made on Speexify. Because our services are digital, some purchases may become non-refundable once access is granted or the service is delivered.
s1_p1: Speexify provides digital services (such as online sessions, digital content, and platform access). No physical goods are shipped.
s1_p2: Once access to a digital service is provided, the service may be considered delivered.
s2_p1: A refund may be considered in the following cases:
s2_li1: A payment was successfully made but the service was not provided due to a technical error attributable to Speexify
s2_li2: A duplicate charge occurred for the same purchase
s2_li3: A session or service was cancelled by Speexify and no suitable alternative or rescheduling was offered
s2_li4: Other cases required by applicable law
s3_p1: Refunds are generally not available in the following cases:
s3_li1: The user has accessed or used the digital content or service
s3_li2: A service has been delivered, started, or consumed (including attending a session or using platform access)
s3_li3: The request is based on change of mind after access is granted
s3_li4: The issue is caused by the userâ€™s device, internet connection, or failure to follow instructions
s3_li5: Any promotional, discounted, or limited-time offers where stated as non-refundable
s4_p1: Refund requests must be submitted within {days} days of the payment date, unless a longer period is required by applicable law.
s5_p1: If a refund is approved, it will be processed using the same payment method used for the original transaction whenever possible.
s5_p2: Refund processing times depend on the payment provider and your bank. Speexify cannot control bank processing timelines.
